data.name: Sample - RSA Netwitness SIEM - 1.2.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "RSA Netwitness SIEM" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Incidents by Date Range
workflows.description: Get the incidents by the date and time they were created.

arguments.title: RSA Netwitness SIEM: Get Incidents by Date Range

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Incidents by Date Range

workflows.name: >> RSA Netwitness SIEM> Fetch Associated events for Incident

arguments.name: RSA Netwitness SIEM

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of alerts from RSA Netwitness SIEM based on the specified parameters.

workflows.name: Get Incident Related Alerts
workflows.description: All the alerts that are associated with an incident can be retrieved using the incident’s unique identifier.

arguments.title: RSA Netwitness SIEM: Get Incident Related Alerts

workflows.name: RSA Netwitness SIEM > Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook demonstrate the list incident operation.

conditions.condition: {{ vars.incident_source_data is not none and vars.incident_source_data | length > 0 }}

routes.name: Update Last Alert Pull Time -> Fetch Associated Events
Create Record -> Update Last Alert Pull Time

workflows.name: > RSA Netwitness SIEM > Fetch
workflows.description: This playbook fetch the open incidents.

arguments.name: RSA Netwitness SIEM

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
    {
       "title":"Pull Alerts Created In Last X Minutes",
       "required":true,
       "editable":true,
       "visible":true,
       "type":"text",
       "name":"minutes",
       "tooltip":"Fetch Alerts from last X minutes. e.g 5",
       "value":30
    },
    {
       "title":"Associated Events to Pull",
       "name":"event_count",
       "type":"integer",
       "required":false,
       "editable":true,
       "visible":true,
       "value":5,
       "tooltip":"The Maximum number associated events to pull for each incident"
    },
    {
       "title":"Maximum Alerts To Pull",
       "name":"alert_count",
       "type":"integer",
       "required":false,
       "editable":true,
       "visible":true,
       "value":1000,
       "tooltip":"The Maximum number of Alerts to be fetched from RSANetwitnessSIEM"
    }
 ]

arguments.name: RSA Netwitness SIEM

arguments.last_pull_time: {%if vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'] | length > 0 %}{%if vars.request.env_setup %}{%if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == ''%}0{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}{% else %}{{vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'][0]['value']}}{% endif %}{% else %}{%if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == ''%}0{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}{% endif %}

conditions.condition: {{ vars.total_pages is not none and vars.total_pages > 0 }}

routes.name: Set Time Configuration -> Get Incident Count
Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Get Incident Count -> Get Records Count

workflows.name: Get Hosts List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the hosts' information based on the service ID specified. It provides a paged response with a standard paged response structure.

arguments.title: RSA Netwitness SIEM: Get Hosts List

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the services with their service IDs.
workflows.name: Get Service IDs

arguments.title: RSA Netwitness SIEM: Get Service IDs
